DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study single multiple ascend dosage level AZD8108 healthy volunteer . The study include 28-day screening period , in-house period AZD8108 placebo administer orally solution , 4- 10-day follow-up period discharge .
DOC.detailed_description: In Part 1 study ( single ascend dose portion ) , approximately 32 subject randomly assign . Eight ( 8 ) subject randomize 4 dosage-level cohort ( AZD8108 placebo ) . Within cohort , 6 subject randomize receive AZD8108 2 subject randomize receive placebo . Each subject receive one dose either AZD8108 placebo Day 1 . In Part 2 study ( multiple ascend dose portion ) , approximately 24 subject randomly assign . Eight ( 8 ) subject randomize 3 dosage-level cohort . Within cohort , 6 subject randomize receive AZD8108 2 subject randomize receive placebo . Each subject receive twelve dose either AZD8108 placebo
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must understand nature study must provide sign dated write informed consent accordance local regulation conduct studyspecific procedure . 2 . Men postmenopausal surgically sterile woman age 1855 year inclusive . 3 . Subjects must body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 , inclusive weigh 50kg 100kg inclusive . 4.Subjects must fluent English . 1 . A history presence clinically significant hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , endocrine , respiratory , immunologic , hematologic , dermatologic , neurologic abnormality . 2 . A clinically significant abnormality physical examination , neurological examination , EEG , ECG , vital sign laboratory evaluation screen screen dose administration . 3 . A history seizure . 4.A history head trauma , include closed head injury loss consciousness . 5.Any history suicide attempt suicidal behavior , , opinion investigator , clinically significant risk suicide violent behavior . 6 . Urine drug screen positive drug abuse 7 . A family history schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , psychosis first degree relative .
